name: Silver Dragon Wyrmling Skeleton
description: The Silver Dragon Wyrmling Skeleton is a medium-sized undead creature with exceptional strength and a skeletal appearance reminiscent of a dragon.
memorable: Its ability to unleash powerful breath attacks, including shards and poisonous gas, makes it a formidable opponent.
goals: To serve its purpose in combat, utilizing its breath weapons and physical attacks.
relations: May be encountered alongside other undead dragons or as an animated servant of a necromancer.
environment: Typically found in dark, deserted areas or lairs associated with dragons.
strengths: Exceptional strength and constitution allow it to deal with significant damage and endure attacks.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to bludgeoning damage and has limited tactical options due to low dexterity and intelligence.
attacks: Bite attack that deals piercing damage and breath weapons that can affect multiple targets with piercing damage or poison.
most_powerful_ability: Breath Weapons allowing it to deal heavy area damage or inflict poisoned conditions.
senses: It possesses blindsight up to 10 feet, allowing it to navigate effectively in the dark.
additional_information: Immunities to cold and poison damage
Condition immunities to exhaustion and poisoned states
